## Description {#details}

File.

## Enumerations

### enum  {#a9da65c9c7c45937ab7da70348f7fb75a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="enum llvm::DIFile::ChecksumKind ">
Which algorithm (e.g.

<EnumerationList title="Enumeration values">

<Link id="a9da65c9c7c45937ab7da70348f7fb75aacdbc9e47dd59830cf2507147e7b732b6" />
<EnumerationListItem name="CSK_MD5">
 (= 1)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a9da65c9c7c45937ab7da70348f7fb75aa3732798a7e4e95f1ade2b4dfd8a4981d" />
<EnumerationListItem name="CSK_SHA1">
 (= 2)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a9da65c9c7c45937ab7da70348f7fb75aade3509cfab03b2f85efdcf8caefd6140" />
<EnumerationListItem name="CSK_SHA256">
 (= 3)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a9da65c9c7c45937ab7da70348f7fb75aaf799c5ad9883b0077fd3f31d1ce55e05" />
<EnumerationListItem name="CSK_Last">
 (= CSK&#95;SHA256)
</EnumerationListItem>

</EnumerationList>

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/md5">MD5</a>) a checksum was generated with.

The encoding is explicit because it is used directly in Bitcode. The value 0 is reserved to indicate the absence of a checksum in Bitcode.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/debuginfometadata-h/#l00582">582</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/debuginfometadata-h">DebugInfoMetadata.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
